subject: [eclipse] allow running of "out-of-workspace" tests
msgSnippet: Eclipse can make JUnit launch tests from a devbench (development workbench) so that they run in a separate instance (e.g. a runtime workbench, aka runbench
messageBody:
Eclipse can make JUnit "launch" tests from a devbench (development
workbench) so that they run in a separate instance (e.g. a runtime
workbench, aka runbench aka target). This does not meet all our test
needs, so I have made

https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=78993

If you find yourself in a similar situation, please take a look,
comment as necessary, vote for fix, etc. OTOH if you have fixes or
workarounds, do tell: feel free to reply to me directly as well as
to this list, comment the bugzilla, etc.
